Package ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandInterface
    Interfaces a command callable by a user interface.
    UserInterface  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DIJKSTRA_Dijkstra
    Dijkstra command runs dijkstra algorithm on a given maze.
    DIJKSTRA_TracePath
    TracePath command marks the path calculated by dijkstra to a given vertex
    DISPLAY_DisplayMaze
    DisplayMaze displays the maze in an output stream.
    DISPLAY_DrawMaze
    DrawMaze draws the maze in a tile map.
    DISPLAY_HideFlag
    HideFlag requires the maze to hide a flag when displaying.
    DISPLAY_HideFlags
    HideFlags requires maze to hide all flags when displaying.
    DISPLAY_ShowFlag
    ShowFlag requires maze to show a flag when displaying.
    DISPLAY_ShowFlags
    ShowFlags requires maze to show all flags when displaying.
    EDIT_AddBox
    AddBox adds a box in the maze
    EDIT_AddCol
    AddCol adds a column to the maze at given position.
    EDIT_AddFlag
    AddFlag adds a flag to a given box in maze.
    EDIT_AddRow
    AddRow adds a row to the maze at a given position.
    EDIT_Clear
    Clear clears all the flags in the maze.
    EDIT_RemBox
    RemBox removes a box in the maze.
    EDIT_RemCol
    RemCol removes a column in the maze at a given position.
    EDIT_RemFlag
    Removes a flag at given coordinates.
    EDIT_RemRoot
    RemRoot removes the current root in maze.
    EDIT_RemRow
    RemRow removes a row in the maze at a given position.
    EDIT_SetRoot
    SetRoot sets a new root in the maze.
    INFO_Help
    Help displays descriptions of all known commands.
    INFO_Usage
    Usage displays how to use a command.
    IO_NewMaze
    NewMaze creates a new maze.
    IO_OpenMaze
    OpenMaze reads a maze from an input stream, typically a file.
    IO_SaveMaze
    SaveMaze writes maze in an output stream.
    MazeManager
    Implementation of a user interface
    UI_LoadScript
    LoadScript loads a script from file.
    UIContext  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IncorrectUsageException
    Signals the number of arguments passed to a command is incorrect.
    InvalidArgumentsException
    Signals at least one arguments was not well formatted.
    NoRootException
    Signals no root was found for running Dijkstra algorithm.
    UIException
    Signals an exception of some sort occured while executing a command.
    UnknownBoxTypeException
    Signals a string does not match with any box type.
    UnknownCommandException
    Signals the required command was not found within the context.
    UnknownFlagException
    Signals a string does not match with any flag.
